description: A city built on water known for its shipbuilding industry and home to the legendary Galley-La Company. The Straw Hats depart from this island in episode 323.

keyEvents.title: Garp Arrives at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Garp arrives at Water 7's coast with Marine forces to capture the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Forces the Straw Hats' hasty departure from the island.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially depart from Water 7 aboard the Thousand Sunny, marking the end of the Water 7 saga.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes one of the most significant arcs in One Piece, with the crew leaving with a new ship and a new shipwright.

keyEvents.title: Final Departure from Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny successfully escapes from Garp's bombardment and sails away from Water 7.
keyEvents.significance: The definitive end of the Water 7 saga.

description: An island near Water 7 where Franky's hideout was located. Usopp runs along this island's shore while desperately trying to catch up with the departing Thousand Sunny.

keyEvents.title: Usopp's Desperate Run
keyEvents.description: Usopp runs desperately along Scrap Island's shore, chasing the Thousand Sunny and struggling with his pride.
keyEvents.significance: The location of Usopp's internal transformation from prideful to humble.

keyEvents.title: Usopp's Apology from Scrap Island
keyEvents.description: Usopp drops to his knees on Scrap Island and screams his heartfelt apology across the water to the Thousand Sunny.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of the most emotional moments in One Piece.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky and the Galley-La Company from Adam Wood. This episode marks its first voyage with the complete crew.

keyEvents.title: Thousand Sunny's Departure
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny begins its journey from Water 7 with the Straw Hat crew (minus Usopp initially).
keyEvents.significance: The ship's first major voyage after being christened.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Pulled Aboard
keyEvents.description: Luffy stretches his arm from the Thousand Sunny to pull Usopp aboard, completing the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The first time all post-Enies Lobby crew members are together on the Thousand Sunny.

keyEvents.title: Defense Against Garp
keyEvents.description: The crew defends the Thousand Sunny from Garp's Genkotsu Meteor bombardment.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's first battle and test of its durability.

statusHistory.reason: Ship completed and currently in use
